channel.title: Portals not working
channel.description:
Hello on my other server/client i had portals whiched teled you from home to the admins hq dessous, green drags ect.
And that source was ddspeced..
I now have a deltascape source and i edited the same object id portals and when i click the portal this is what it says in the server cmd box.
[client-2-Orenge juice]: atObject: 3090,3487 objectID: 7319
Heres my code
[code] makeGlobalObject(3095, 3487, 7353, -2, 10); // added by Orenge juice portal to hq[/code]
Can somone please tell me how come when i click the portals it doesnt tele me to a destination?
Thanks

item.title: Portals not working
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Kalvin:

idk if people are reading this topic the reason why i made this thread is because evrerthime i click a portal at home it doesnt work…

That’s because you haven’t added the correct case in the correct place. You need to find case 132 in the Client class - This is the last thing i am saying because it’s been said to you many times now.

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:32, topic:259391”][quote author=x blitz x link=topic=342520.msg2648674#msg2648674 date=1233412651]
This has been explained. Therefore he should know where and what to do.
[/quote]

quiet agree, a couple of posts, have explained how to do it and doesnt listen.

as staff say, read tuts and google befor you post, obviously he hasnt because he wants everyone else to do it for him.

This is not the right place for an arguement, and this is a server help section, helping him
is explaining how to…

even though this is the help section, he is being very lazy.

idk if people are reading this topic the reason why i made this thread is because evrerthime i click a portal at home it doesnt work…

thats simply because you havnt listened to any of us and havnt used the search button, or you would of had it fixed by now.

making a portal work is the very basics. cannot even add a case, dont even bother making a server at all.[/quote]
Thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: Portals not working
item.dc:creator: @Z0D14C Z0D14C
item.description:
@Z0D14C wrote:

Search:

switch(objectID) {

Then add:

case ####: // Information
doTele(XXXX, YYYY, Height)
break;

####ObjectID
X and Y is easy to know…

Note doTele could possibly not be the right method name on your server…
For example could be:
TeletoX
TeletoY

Read full topic
